title: The server is curently busy try again later
body: Im getting this messige every time i try to login.Im from EUNE serever one of my friends have the same problem please help!Its says that the server status right now is fine

replies.body: Some EU players appear to be having some ISP issues, per our [pinned ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu)thread.  Hopefully this has been resolved by now, but if not then a vpn or [dns confing](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) might help.  Hang tight!
